i1.name: More Sparkles!
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an [[champion ability|ability]], '''Zoe's''' next [[basic attack]] becomes {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}} and her next attack or {{ai|Spell Thief|Zoe}} bubble within 5 seconds deals {{pp|16;20;24;28;32;36;42;48;54;60;66;74;82;90 to 130|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: After casting an champion ability, Zoe's next basic attack becomes non-projectile and her next attack or Spell Thief bubble within 5 seconds deals 16;20;24;28;32;36;42;48;54;60;66;74;82;90undefined âˆ’ 130undefined (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage.

w1.name: Spell Thief
description: {{sbc|Passive - Spell Thief:}} Whenever enemy champions cast a {{ccib|Summoner spell icon.png|summoner spell}} or {{ccib|Active ability item icon.png|Active ability items|item active}}, they drop the corresponding ''{{as|{{ccib|Spell Thief Minimap.png||Spell Shard}}|armor}}'' onto the ground that grants {{tip|sight}} over a 100-radius area and remains for 40 seconds. Some enemy {{tip|minions}} spawn with random ''{{as|Spell Shards|armor}}'' that only drop to the ground for 20 seconds if killed by '''Zoe'''.

Collecting a ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}'' allows '''Zoe''' to activate ''Spell Thief'' within the next 60 seconds. She can replace her current ''Spell Thief'' active by moving directly onto another ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}''.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' mimics the active of the collected ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}''.

{{sbc|Passive - Wheeeee:}} Casting ''Spell Thief'' or one of '''Zoe's''' own summoner spells grants her {{sti|ms|{{As|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the next few seconds, and summons three bubbles that orbit her for the next 10 seconds.

If '''Zoe''' is not affected by [[Crowd control#Loss of Control|total crowd control]] she hurls one bubble at a time at the nearest enemy in range, prioritizing her attack target, dealing {{as|magic damage}} with each bubble.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Spell Thief: Whenever enemy champions cast a Unknown value: ccib Summoner spell icon.png summoner spell or Unknown value: ccib Active ability item icon.png Active ability items item active, they drop the corresponding Unknown value: ccib Spell Thief Minimap.png Spell Shard onto the ground that grants sight over a 100-radius area and remains for 40 seconds. Some enemy minions spawn with random Spell Shards that only drop to the ground for 20 seconds if killed by Zoe.
Collecting a Spell Shard allows Zoe to activate Spell Thief within the next 60 seconds. She can replace her current Spell Thief active by moving directly onto another Spell Shard.
Active: Zoe mimics the active of the collected Spell Shard.
Passive - Wheeeee: Casting Spell Thief or one of Zoe's own summoner spells grants her bonus movement speed for the next few seconds, and summons three bubbles that orbit her for the next 10 seconds.
If Zoe is not affected by Crowd control#Loss of Control she hurls one bubble at a time at the nearest enemy in range, prioritizing her attack target, dealing magic damage with each bubble.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Orb|{{ap|25|35|45|55|65}} {{as|(+ {{fd|13.{{Recurring|3}}}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|75|105|135|165|195}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* Mimics the details of the mimicked active.
* Minions that can drop ''{{as|Spell Shards|armor}}'' are marked with a tied cosmic balloon that floats above them. This is only visible to '''Zoe''' and her allies.
** Minions do not drop a shard for {{si|Teleport}}.
* '''Zoe''' utilizes an attack-like animation whenever one of the bubbles hurls itself at an enemy, making it look as if she can attack while moving.
* '''Zoe''' cannot steal [[Consumable item|consumables]], [[trinket]]s, [[Item#Classification|component]] items, or items that create deployable or persistent effects. Some actives are excluded for balance purposes. The following list was last checked November 8th<ref>[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I4u0eOkzQHs Spell Thief list]</ref>:
{{Zoe Spell Thief list}}

e1.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' kicks a ''bubble'' in the target direction that bursts on the first enemy hit, or else forming a trap at maximum range for 5 seconds that arms after {{fd|0.8}} seconds. The ''bubble'' can only move through terrain once but may do so indefinitely, can only move up to 650 units once outside terrain, and will fall short if it would enter terrain again.

The ''bubble'' deals {{as|magic damage}} on contact with an enemy and renders them {{tip|drowsy}} for {{fd|1.4}} seconds, which gradually {{tip|slow|slows}} them, after which they fall {{tip|sleep|asleep}} for {{fd|2.25}} seconds.

The next non-{{tip|persistent damage|persistent}} non-{{tip|minion}} damage taken by the {{tip|sleep|sleeping}} target consumes the debuff to deal {{sti|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} equal to the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt, capped at ''Sleepy Trouble Bubble's'' damage. The '''bonus''' damage is dealt before the triggering damage.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zoe kicks a bubble in the target direction that bursts on the first enemy hit, or else forming a trap at maximum range for 5 seconds that arms after 0.8 seconds. The bubble can only move through terrain once but may do so indefinitely, can only move up to 650 units once outside terrain, and will fall short if it would enter terrain again.
The bubble deals magic damage on contact with an enemy and renders them drowsy for 1.4 seconds, which gradually slows them, after which they fall asleep for 2.25 seconds.
The next non-persistent non-minion damage taken by the sleeping target consumes the debuff to deal bonus true damage equal to the post-mitigation damage dealt, capped at Sleepy Trouble Bubble's damage. The bonus damage is dealt before the triggering damage.
e1.notes:
* '''Zoe''' will gain {{tip|obscured vision}} of the target while they're {{tip|sleep|asleep}} if they are not {{tip|sight|visible}}.
* If exceptionally close to terrain, the ball will pass through without detection and will still be able to pass through a second piece of terrain - although it sacrifices any range its already used going through the first piece.
* ''Sleepy Trouble Bubble's'' range will be extended if '''Zoe''' casts it right before blinking back from {{ai|Portal Jump|Zoe}}. This is due to the range of the missile being measured near the end of the cast time and '''Zoe''' already having blinked back once the cast time finishes.

r1.name: Portal Jump
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' dives into a portal that she opens beneath her, {{tip|blink|blinking}} a fixed distance in the target direction for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, during which she sets her {{as|movement speed}} to a {{as|static 0|ms}} and has {{tip|unobstructed vision}}. After 1 second, she blinks back to her cast location.
'''Zoe''' is unable to basic attack and cast her abilities and movement spells for {{fd|0.75}} seconds after casting ''Portal Jump'' and for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after blinking back.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zoe dives into a portal that she opens beneath her, blinking a fixed distance in the target direction for 0.75 seconds, during which she sets her movement speed to a static 0 and has unobstructed vision. After 1 second, she blinks back to her cast location.
Zoe is unable to basic attack and cast her abilities and movement spells for 0.75 seconds after casting Portal Jump and for 0.5 seconds after blinking back.
r1.notes:
* '''Zoe''' will always {{tip|blink}} back.
** She will still be considered to blink even if she fails to move her intended location while {{tip|attach|attached}} (e.g. if she were affected by {{ai|The Show Stopper|Sett}}).
* '''Zoe''' can attack and cast abilities and movement spells at the target location for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after she is able to use them again.
* Upon reaching her destination, '''Zoe''' will either raspberry at the nearest enemy champion, or lick an ice cream cone when there are no enemy champions in {{tip|sight}}.
* '''Zoe''''s return position is shifted slightly in the target direction from her cast location.
